Egor Lynov Website

Hi, my name is Egor and this is basic information about me

I am a software engineer based in Prague, currently working as a data engineer. In this role, I develop and maintain infrastructure for DS & ML using various programming languages and technologies.

After graduating from Voronezh State University with a degree in system programming, I started my career as a software engineer before transitioning to become a data engineer.

Since moving to Prague in 2022, I have been working as a specialist in data engineering, where I focus on building and maintaining systems that can store, consolidate, and retrieve data. As a data engineer, I work independently to handle tasks related to data, but also collaborate with other software engineers to develop applications and systems.
